item.title: Cloud Init - episode 1
item.description: Get the Code! What you will find here In this new article, we will use: Cloud Init HashiCorp Packer Terraform Bitnami's Kubeseal secret manager To automate virtual machines creation from templates. References a video tuorial I fully experimented : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=exeuvgPxd-E
